description:
As a mysterious series of murders occur in Tokyo, Inuki goes missing.
Chihiro desperately searched for him, but he`s informed Inuki is the traitor.
Just as Chihiro`s not sure what to believe, Yuri appears before him.
Though they know they are enemies would must kill one another, they express themselves with words and feel a complicated calmness...
Meanwhile, Inuki continues to plunge towards destruction.
Chihiro dons his blood armaments in order to save him. What is waiting for him at the end of a fierce battle?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aux âmes sombres, rien ne sied mieux que la lumière
Bright Lights Suit a Dark Heart
Kurai Kokoro ni wa Akarui Hikari ga Fusawashii
暗い心には明るい光が相応しい
